title: IIT Madras
summary: Indian Institute of Technology Madras (IIT Madras) is a public technical university located in Chennai (formerly named as Madras), Tamil Nadu, India. As one of the Indian Institutes of Technology (IITs), it is recognised as an Institute of National Importance.[5] Founded in 1959 with technical and financial assistance from the former government of West Germany, it was the third IIT established by the Government of India.[6][7] IIT Madras is ranked the top engineering institute in India by the Ministry of Education's National Institutional Ranking Framework since its inception in 2016.[8][9][10]
